dialogueTree.title: Yellow Man Mug: "It's just a racist mug, what's ther..."
dialogueTree.text: It's just a racist mug, what's there to *read* here? Not much.

links.title: You: "I want to get into that mug talk ag..."
links.text: I want to get into that mug talk again.

links.title: Yellow Man Mug: "But it will not happen. The mug tal..."
links.text: But it will not happen. The mug talk is exhausted. It is time to return to work.

links.title: You: "There's quite a lot to read into he..."
links.text: There's quite a lot to read into here, actually. Look at all that content.

links.title: Yellow Man Mug: "Oh, boy. Here we go. What are you g..."
links.text: Oh, boy. Here we go. What are you going to say about a broken, tossed away mug that *you* dug out of the garbage?

links.title: You: "This mug is an example of prejudice..."
links.text: This mug is an example of prejudice. I'm going to use it as an example of what *not* to do.

links.title: Yellow Man Mug: "But it was in the trash. Why not ju..."
links.text: But it was in the trash. Why not just call it out when you see it? Or do some volunteering work? Just finish your case, detective.

links.title: You: "I'm going to push this into the fac..."
links.text: I'm going to push this into the face of every merchant I find and tell them: this is *your* inane ideology.

links.title: Yellow Man Mug: "So again, you dug it out of the tra..."
links.text: So again, you dug it out of the trash *why*? It wasn't going to offend anyone there. Why don't you just get back to your case?

links.title: You: "The mug will be useful. By denounci..."
links.text: The mug will be useful. By denouncing it I can earn *political* capital to mask my bad ass hustling (ie, fraud and embezzlement).

links.title: Yellow Man Mug: "If you want to earn some change by..."
links.text: If you want to earn some change by guilting people, go for it. But if you want to earn real dough, finish the case and start getting *paid* again.

links.title: You: "The mug didn't belong in the trash...."
links.text: The mug didn't belong in the trash. It was just a funny mug. Can't anyone laugh anymore?

links.title: Yellow Man Mug: "Understood. You're *that* kind of d..."
links.text: Understood. You're *that* kind of detective. Why don't you get back to your case?
